trans-unit.target: Vous n'avez pas de compte? S'inscrire

trans-unit.note: Title next to switch, must be very short
Search demo turned on - alert title

trans-unit.target: Je ne peux pas télécharger les photos.

trans-unit.id: It can send you notifications when there are some cool new photos.
trans-unit.source: It can send you notifications when there are some cool new photos.
trans-unit.target: Elle peut vous envoyer des notifications quand il y a des nouvelles photos cools.
trans-unit.note: Description that inform user that permissions are needed to send local notifications about new photos
button which will log in unsplash user
button which will log out unsplash user

trans-unit.id: Looks like you haven't bought Background Premium 😇

trans-unit.note: Info, when there is no results after searching

trans-unit.target: Maintenant, vous pouvez utiliser la Recherche pour un jour

alert with error title in-app purchase was deferred, for exmaple phote has parental control turned on and user can't complete purchase

trans-unit.id: Purchase was deferred. I will disable buttons for some time
trans-unit.source: Purchase was deferred. I will disable buttons for some time
trans-unit.target: L'achat a été reporté. Je vais désactiver les boutons pour un moment

trans-unit.id: Purchase was deferred. I will disable buttons.
trans-unit.source: Purchase was deferred. I will disable buttons.
trans-unit.target: L'achat a été reporté. Je vais désactiver les boutons.

trans-unit.note: alert body after purchasing background premium

trans-unit.id: The button below will open Background's App Store page, where you can rate it.
trans-unit.source: The button below will open Background's App Store page, where you can rate it.
trans-unit.target: Le bouton ci-dessous ouvrira la page de Background sur l'App Store, où vous pouvez la noter.
trans-unit.note: description of button - which will open App Store page

trans-unit.id: To save photos give Background access to your Photo Library.
trans-unit.source: To save photos give Background access to your Photo Library.
trans-unit.target: Pour enregistrer les photos, donnez Background l'accès à votre bibliothèque de photos.
trans-unit.note: Description that inform user that permissions are needed to save photo

trans-unit.id: Touch and hold a photo to save it.
trans-unit.source: Touch and hold a photo to save it.
trans-unit.target: Appuyez sur une photo et maintenir pour l'enregistrer.

trans-unit.note: Alert action when photos can't be downloaded onboarding - error button action

trans-unit.id: Unfortunately I can't save this photo to your Photo Library. Check out Settings – I think I don't have access to your Photo Library.
trans-unit.source: Unfortunately I can't save this photo to your Photo Library. Check out Settings – I think I don't have access to your Photo Library.
trans-unit.target: Malheureusement, je ne peux pas enregistrer cette photo dans votre bibliothèque de photos. Vérifiez les paramètres - Je pense je n'ai pas accès à votre bibliothèque de photos.

trans-unit.id: Want to help translating the app into your language? Want to test a beta version of the app? Need a help?
trans-unit.source: Want to help translating the app into your language? Want to test a beta version of the app? Need a help?
trans-unit.target: Voulez-vous m'aider traduisez l'application dans votre langue? Voulez-vous tester la version béta de l'application?
trans-unit.note: link to github repo with translations

trans-unit.id: When switching the screen, Background will display an overlay with the name of the screen.
trans-unit.source: When switching the screen, Background will display an overlay with the name of the screen.
trans-unit.target: Lors du changement d'écrant, Background affichera une superposition avce le nom de l'écran.
trans-unit.note: Description of ability to download full resolution photo in Settings

trans-unit.id: While saving a photo, Background downloads the full–size picture. \nRequires Background Premium.
trans-unit.source: While saving a photo, Background downloads the full–size picture. \nRequires Background Premium.
trans-unit.target: Tout en sauvegardant la photo, l'application télécharge l'image en taille réelle. \nNécessite Background Premium.
trans-unit.note: Description of ability to download full resolution photo in Settings

trans-unit.id: With Background Premium you can like a photo by double tapping.\nAll of them will be visible here.\nIf you have the Unsplash account, log in in the settings and Background will download all your liked photos.
trans-unit.source: With Background Premium you can like a photo by double tapping.\nAll of them will be visible here.\nIf you have the Unsplash account, log in in the settings and Background will download all your liked photos.
trans-unit.target: Avec Background Premium vous pouvez aimer une photo en appuyant deux fois.\nTous seront disponibles ici.\nSi vous avez un compte Unsplash, se connecter dans paramètres et Background va télécharger tous vos photos aimés.

trans-unit.id:
With Background Premium you get:
No ads.
Search.
You can:
Save full resolution photos. 
Like photos (on Unsplash or locally).
With this one time in-app purchase you help me keep the app alive. Thanks!
trans-unit.source:
With Background Premium you get:
No ads.
Search.
You can:
Save full resolution photos. 
Like photos (on Unsplash or locally).
With this one time in-app purchase you help me keep the app alive. Thanks!
trans-unit.target:
Avec Background Premium vous obtenez:
Aucunes annonces.
La Recherche.
Vous pouvez:
Enregistrer les photos en pleine résolution. 
Aimé les photos (sur Unsplash ou localement).
Avec ce seul fois achat dans l'application vous m'aidez à la garder actif. Merci!

trans-unit.id: With Unsplash account you can like a photo on unsplash.com.\nWithout it all liked photos will be kept on device.\nRequires Background Premium.
trans-unit.source: With Unsplash account you can like a photo on unsplash.com.\nWithout it all liked photos will be kept on device.\nRequires Background Premium.
trans-unit.target: Avec un compte Unsplash vous pouvez aimer des photos sur unsplash.com.\Sans compte toutes les photos aimées seront conservées sur votre appareil.\nNécessite Background Premium.
